EmailTemplate.name: Marty/Owen PCF.Email 2 - Case Study
EmailTemplate.subject: See how one top merchant increased sales by 64%
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thousands of businesses around the world have become more successful by switching to BigCommerce. Since Cynthia and Michael Jamin of TwirlyGirl <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/twirlygirl-case-study-pcf.html]]> moved their children's clothing store, they've seen:
- A 64% increase in sales - A 51% increase in monthly revenue - A 43% increase in monthly transactions
Our free case study has all the details on how TwirlyGirl has grown with BigCommerce.
Download the case study <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/twirlygirl-case-study-pcf.html]]>
Please give us a call <[[tel:+18446328911]]> if you'd like to learn more about Bigcommerce. Thousands of businesses have become more successful by switching to Bigcommerce. Check out the case study from TwirlyGirl to find how
Case study: TwirlyGirl See how merchants like you have increased sales with BigCommerce
